title: Can people DoS or DDoS you through discord?
body: Hi!, was wondering this statement because i joined a discord while playing a ranked game and i decided to join later on i received some ping lag but it was not terrible (but bad enough to not play) which was 43 in league to 120-150 on discord im usually at 32 but i got 123-125 solid (is this a DoS attack/ DDoS attack sorry i'm an idiot so just wondering)
